required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CD 70 CAR T for Patients With CD70 Positive Malignant Hematologic Diseases
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial for the Safety and Efficacy of CD 70 CAR T for Patients With CD70 Positive Malignant Hematologic Diseases

brief_summary.textblock: A Study of CD 70 CAR T for patients with CD70 positive malignant hematologic diseases

detailed_description.textblock: This is a single arm, open-label, single-center study. This study is indicated for CD 70 CAR T for patients with CD70 positive malignant hematologic diseases. The selections of dose levels and the number of subjects are based on clinical trials of similar foreign products. 108 patients will be enrolled. Primary objective is to explore the safety,main consideration is dose-related safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 28 days after CD70 targeted CAR T-cells infusion
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events assessed according to NCI-CTCAE v5.0 criteria

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 targeted CAR T-cells infusion
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [Safety and Tolerability]

secondary_outcome.measure: Acute Myeloid Leukemia (AML), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi) at Month 1, 3, 6, 12, 18 and 24

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to death or the last visit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse or gene relapse, disease progression (any one occurs first), and the last visit
Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi) at Month 1, 3, 6, 12, 18 and 24

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to death or the last visit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse or gene relapse,
Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi) at Month 1, 3, 6, 12, 18 and 24

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to death or the last visit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CD70 CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CD70 CAR-T cells to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse or gene relapse

Assessment using European Organisation for the Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire Core 30 (EORTC QLQ-C30) scale [For item1-28: max score: 112, min score: 28, higher scores mean a better outcome; for item 28-29: max score: 14, min score: 2, higher scores mean a worse outcome] to measure Quality of life at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12
Assessment using Activities of Daily Living (ADL) scale (Barthel Index) [max score: 100, min score: 0, higher scores mean a better outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADL) score
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADL) scale [max score: 56, min score: 14, higher scores mean a worse outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) score
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment using Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) [max score: 42, min score: 0, higher scores mean a worse outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

intervention.description: Each subject receive CD70 CAR T-cells by intravenous infusion

facility.name: The first affiliated hospital of medical college of zhejiang university
